text: The 2001 NFL Europe season was the 9th season in 11 years of the American Football league that started out as the World League of American Football. ==World Bowl IX== Berlin 24-17 Barcelona Saturday, June 30, 2001 Amsterdam ArenA Amsterdam, Netherlands == References == Category:2001 in American football Category:NFL Europe (WLAF) seasons
title: 2001 NFL Europe season
